casebody.data:
Thomas MARRA
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 2, 2017 Cheryl A. Juniewic, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

The petitioner Thomas Marra's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 174 Conn.App. 440 , 166 A.3d 678 (2017), is denied.

PALMER, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
